meta.title: Emelly Beatriz | Frontend Developer - Project Portfolio
meta.description: Portfolio of Emelly Beatriz, a frontend developer passionate about technology and design. Explore my projects in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python and see how I transform ideas into functional and aesthetic digital solutions.
meta.keywords: Frontend Developer, Portfolio, Emelly Beatriz, Web Developer, Projects, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, UI/UX
meta.ogDescription: Explore the projects of Emelly Beatriz, a frontend developer who creates creative and functional digital solutions.

home.intro1: , my job is to transform complex challenges into digital solutions that unite usability, aesthetics, and functionality. ðŸš€

project1.alt: Dashboard for salary analysis in the data area
project1.title: Salary Analysis Dashboard for the Data Field
project1.description: An interactive dashboard built with Python and Streamlit to explore and analyze salary data in the Data Science field, based on data collected in recent years.

project2.title: Rock, Paper, Scissors Game
project2.description: An interactive Rock, Paper, Scissors game developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript where users can play against the computer, testing their skills and luck.

project3.title: CPF Validator
project3.description: A simple tool built with pure JavaScript to validate CPF numbers based on the official algorithm.

project4.title: Stopwatch
project4.description: A simple stopwatch developed with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, allowing users to start, pause, and reset the time.

project5.title: Netflix Replica
project5.description: A high-fidelity model of the Netflix interface, developed with only HTML and CSS. This project focuses on visually reproducing the platform's layout and design, providing a visual experience similar to the original, without interactive functionalities.

project6.title: BMI Calculator
project6.description: A simple and functional BMI (Body Mass Index) calculator developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This tool allows users to enter their weight and height to calculate their BMI, providing a quick and easy assessment of their body condition.

project7.title: To-Do List
project7.description: A To-Do List application developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to add and remove tasks, providing a simple and effective way to manage their daily activities.

project8.title: Solar System
project8.description: An interactive Solar System project developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project allows users to explore the planets of our solar system in a visual and educational way, providing an engaging and informative experience.

project9.title: Calculator
project9.description: A simple calculator developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, allowing users to perform basic mathematical operations intuitively and quickly.

project10.title: Simple Calculator
project10.description: A simple calculator developed with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, allowing basic operations like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.

project11.title: Modern Cordel
project11.description: A Modern Cordel project developed with HTML and CSS, presenting a contemporary approach to traditional cordel literature.

project12.title: History of the Android Mascot
project12.description: A project that explores the history of the Android mascot, developed with HTML and CSS. This project presents a visual narrative about the evolution of the iconic mascot of the Android operating system.

footer.aboutText: Made it to the end? Awesome! If my work has sparked your interest, let's not stop here. Connect with me to create something amazing together.
